VXLIB Function Reference

Gaussian Image Pyramid

OpenVX Function Description

  • Computes a Gaussian Image Pyramid from an input image.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/d0/d15/group__group__vision__function__gaussian__pyramid.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_gaussian_5x5_i8u_o8u : Input image is U8 format and output image is U8 format
  • VXLIB_scaleImageNearest_i8u_o8u : Input image is U8 format and output image is U8 format
  • VXLIB_halfScaleGaussian_5x5_i8u_o8u : Input image is U8 format and output image is U8 format
